title: Possible to Crowdfund Our OWN Police Probe?!

replies.msg:
I am always a CD ROM, but when I was reading this SCMP article and cannot agree more!

Will it works if we can get the help from 攬炒 group along with some AUTHORITY such as Legislative Councillor to support to FUND OUR OWN formal, independent review of police conduct?

https://www.scmp.com/comment/opinion/article/3031444/hong-kong-protests-if-government-wont-agree-police-conduct-inquiry

For all the research and info we had, there must be a way that we can put them into good use!!!


話說我地花左兩個月時間, 睇左過百條片, 終於
我地製作左文宣, 係 270 頁黑警濫權獨立調查報告
但係咁岩撞正連登熄登,
無咩人推, 幾日過千正評都無
我好灰, 但我唔會放棄
唯有硬著頭皮, 開新 Post 推多次
同法律港女一樣, 我地會做實事,
依家搞緊英文翻譯, 然後就會製作文宣, 推向國際, 推向全世界
到時係聯合國好, 海牙好, 紐倫堡好, 美國國會, 英國國會, 歐盟
全部都係我地射程範圍
但係真係要大家廣傳, 所以希望大家真係唔好俾呢個POST 沉
好多人睇到唔訓覺, 工都辭埋, 甚至要抑鬱睇精神科
大家都係想香港贏, 香港人贏, 所以唔該唔好等我地心血白費

中文版本—公眾試閱版—正文
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1N1rzVWFW0EnJugLGNkYu7A-9-KigPWn4fVEGVDve79k/edit?fbclid=IwAR21_yhLiZdK5AomLJtR35StBwNgZgSRGWrWj_euiUeeNp9xe0-WK-D-INU
警隊涉嫌濫權資料（六／七月）
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1RMY12ApIxNTaOudzjvYXzq6Vc0iE99zJJ2M8t0uOKYI/edit?fbclid=IwAR1wOFXnXUPhhJRRJVPu7lyUUEgqnVKgqw9PsOcOhr5aJDTkVB48AalV52U
警隊涉嫌濫權資料（至八月十日）
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TKPNvv_YqRKF8Y2wRi28J89-VTMIsfNAiFsuXX4g1r8/edit?fbclid=IwAR3YncCQfwWBiUnV7e_XJoWDokdkg8DEcZPCA1hrenPmV-pbdPrVUK4kDfE
同埋！！！極重要
英文版好快就會係連登／ＴＷＩＴＴＥＲ／ＦＢ流出！！！

SOURCE:LIHKG

We are temporarily using live channel直播台as english channel
https://lih.kg/1634498

[國際戰線] 連登開左英文台！English Channel is LIVE now on LIHKG!
https://lih.kg/1634824
